Header.title: Brainwave
Header.paragraph: Taking Meeting notes has never been easier. Power up your productivity by not missing any details from your meetings.

About.paragraph: CS210, also referred to as Software Projects with Corporate Partners, is a senior project course at Stanford University. Our group, consisting of CS majors with diverse skill sets, was assigned to collaborate with BMW. Our objective was to develop an innovative application that would enhance productivity within vehicles. With a strong ambition to create a marketable product, we sought to leverage the most advanced AI models available. After two quarters of dedicated work and an insightful visit to BMW headquarters in Munich, we proudly present our final creation.

Features.title: Instantly View Past/Present Meetings
Features.text: Quickly view your past and current meetings. Meetings are sorted by relevance and live meetings will appear instantly.

Features.title: Live Transcription & Dirization
Features.text: Meetings are transcribed in real time with a latency of ~15 seconds. Live Transcription also includes audio dirization (labeling of different voices)

Features.title: Summary & TODO's
Features.text: Both a summary and a list of TODO items are generated once the meeting has ended

Features.title: Live Entity Recognition
Features.text: As your meeting notes are being transcribed in real time certain entities will be highlighted blue. When you click on these words a quick summarization provided by chat-GPT is produced.

Features.title: Followup Questions
Features.text: You can quickly ask chat-GPT any questions you have about your meeting.

Features.title: Automatic Meeting Suggestions
Features.text: At the end of your meeting we automatically suggest any followup events that you should add on your calendar. Any fututre meeting details discussed in your meeting transcript will appear here.
